channel.title: Mac compilation error
channel.description:
*****-MacBook-Pro:~ ******$ cd /Users/*****/Desktop/Client *****-MacBook-Pro:Client *****$ javac *.java client.java:6738: error: ')' expected if(myPrivilege == 2 || server.equals(127.0.0.1) || 1 == 1/*to remove*/) { ^ client.java:6738: error: not a statement if(myPrivilege == 2 || server.equals(127.0.0.1) || 1 == 1/*to remove*/) { ^ client.java:6738: error: ';' expected if(myPrivilege == 2 || server.equals(127.0.0.1) || 1 == 1/*to remove*/) { ^ client.java:15278: error: ';' expected server = 127.0.0.1; 4 errors *****-MacBook-Pro:Client *****$
any ideas on what I need to do to fix this?

item.title: Mac compilation error
item.dc:creator: @ITI_Basak_ITI ITI Basak ITI
item.description:
@ITI_Basak_ITI wrote:

*****-MacBook-Pro:~ *$ cd /Users//Desktop/Client
*****-MacBook-Pro:Client *****$ javac *.java
client.java:6738: error: ‘)’ expected
if(myPrivilege == 2 || server.equals(127.0.0.1) || 1 == 1/to remove/) {
^
client.java:6738: error: not a statement
if(myPrivilege == 2 || server.equals(127.0.0.1) || 1 == 1/to remove/) {
^
client.java:6738: error: ‘;’ expected
if(myPrivilege == 2 || server.equals(127.0.0.1) || 1 == 1/to remove/) {
^
client.java:15278: error: ‘;’ expected
server = 127.0.0.1;
4 errors
*****-MacBook-Pro:Client *****$

any ideas on what I need to do to fix this?

Read full topic
